abstractText: The same 25 deepwater fall Chinook salmon spawning sites are sampled each year in the Snake River. Counts are made at each site and then summed for all sites surveyed to obtain an annual total for the sites surveyed. This information is used to track the number of redds constructed annually as part of a long-term monitoring effort for the Snake River fall Chinook population.
title: Deepwater Redd Surveys v1.0
